nl.corebooster.setup

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.corebooster.setup.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes the player with all his functions in the game
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Raymon de Looff, Thijs Clowting, Richard Weug
